oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bible with name and death date of Pvt. Samuel Barnhill, 46th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Samuel Barnhill Co. B, 46th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA was captured at Island No. 10 on April 8, 1862 and sent to Camp Douglas, Illinois where he died of "congestion of the brain" on August 4, 1862. Margaret Ann Campbell was most likely his sister. Elizabeth Barnhill was the mother of both. The Barnhills lived in Henry County, Tennessee.
